2021 IMPACT REPORT51 TABLE OF CONTENTS APPENDIX
Code Activity Metric 2021 Response
TC-SI-000.A (1) Number of licenses or subscriptions, (2) percentage cloud-based Upwork is 99% cloud-based with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and has one enterprise 
subscription with AWS
TC-SI-000.B (1) Data processing capacity, (2) percentage outsourced (1) Data processing fluctuates depending on traffic. (2) 100% is outsourced to AWS
TC-SI-000.C (1) Amount of data storage, (2) percentage outsourced As of December 2021, Upwork has 4. 12PB data storage and 100% is outsourced
SV-PS-000.A Number of employees by: (1) full-time and part-time, (2) temporary, and (3) contract (1) Full-time: 642
(2) Part-time: 4
(3) Contractor/freelancer: 1,759
